item.title: Congress to Hold Divisional-Level Protest in Raichur on May 7 Against Soaring Prices
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: The Congress party will hold a divisional-level protest rally in Raichur on May 7 to highlight the sustained rise in prices of essential commodities under the BJP-led central government. The protest, to be held at Mahatma Gandhi Stadium, is aimed at sending a strong message to the BJP, said Karnataka Minister for Minor Irrigation and Science & Technology N.S. Boseraju on Sunday.
Addressing a preparatory meeting with party leaders from the municipal limits at his office, Boseraju said t...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
